creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: four woven panels with sides sewn together and center seams front and back embroidered together; alternating rows of narrow horizontal stripes and rows of animal and bird figures and geometrics; bottom has "flounce" of off-white; pink, purple and red with solid red yokes with geometric designs; neckline is vertical slits front and back
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
